description: Base 8 digits are, in order, the first n terms of the periodic sequence with initial period 1,0,0.
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..200
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (8,0,1,-8).
mathematica: Module[{nn=30,d},d=PadRight[{},nn,{1,0,0}];Table[FromDigits[Take[d,n],8],{n,nn}]] (* or *) LinearRecurrence[{8,0,1,-8},{1,8,64,513},50] (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Nov 13 2013 *)CoefficientList[Series[1/((x - 1) (8 x - 1) (x^2 + x + 1)), {x, 0, 40}], x] (* _Vincenzo Librandi_, May 01 2014 *)
author: _Clark Kimberling_
extensions: More terms from _Harvey P. Dale_, Nov 13 2013
